Name: Skid Row
Ingredients: 15 ml De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS flamed orange zest twist over cocktail, then use as garnish.
Review: Complex, spirit-forward, and bittersweet with apricot liqueur and amaro laced with  Dutch genever.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2009 by Eric Alperin at The Varnish in Los Angeles, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Skid Row contains 168 calories
